projects.name: Embers of Caerus Investor Prototype
projects.blurb: Be whatever you want to be in our massive medieval low-fantasy world. Putting the sand back into sandbox, and Massive back into MMORPG.

projects.name: Zombie Playground (#zpg) - 3D Action, Online Battle RPG
projects.blurb: Zombie Playground is a game where you take the role of a kid during a zombie apocalypse as seen through a child's imagination.

projects.name: Project: Viki
projects.blurb: Project: Viki is a TIME MACHINE to play old games.  It is completely custom, wood, glass, brass, stained glass, museum quality.

projects.name: Paranormal
projects.blurb: You're a person with a camera inside a haunted house. Will you survive? Every haunting is unique! Experience the fear!

projects.name: Tough to Kill
projects.blurb: Zombie survival shoot 'em up arcade game... from the comfort of your own browser! Created by harnessing the awesome power of HTML5.

projects.name: The Return of Tom vs. Bruce
projects.blurb: Tom Chick and Bruce Geryk wrote one of the iconic player-vs-player columns in videogaming.  They want to bring it back!

projects.name: Lilly Looking Through: An animated adventure game
projects.blurb: Help Lilly as she seeks to rewrite the past, change the present, and unlock the ultimate mystery.

projects.name: Warrior Gaming Lair: Motivation and Achievement Via Gaming
projects.blurb: We hope to increase student achievement and attendance at school by infusing play and gaming strategies into our school.

projects.name: Auro: A turn-based, cross-platform tactics game
projects.blurb: Auro is a turn-based dungeon-crawling strategy game for iOS, Android, Windows and other platforms.

projects.name: Build Your Own Arcade
projects.blurb: Build an 80's inspired retro arcade, and play your favorite games with a big stick, and fat buttons.

projects.name: Past Midnight - 1-4-24 iOS Turn based Game -Take 2 -Requote
projects.blurb: I am bringing a timeless bar dice game into the digital world on iOS. The game needs one last "kick" to make my dream a reality.

projects.name: The Repopulation
projects.blurb: The Repopulation is a Sci-Fi Sandbox-Hybrid MMORPG focusing on player created content and the freedom to choose your own path.

projects.name: Dead State: The Zombie Survival RPG
projects.blurb: A turn-based RPG with branching dialogue, shelter management, and survival mechanics set in the zombie apocalypse.

projects.name: Rival Threads : Last Class Heroes - The Final Push
projects.blurb: Action RPG featuring stunning 2D visuals, fast paced gameplay and multiple story lines. For iOS, Android, OSX and Windows.

projects.name: Cult: Awakening of the Old Ones
projects.blurb: An open-ended sandbox RPG that combines immersive fiction and procedurally generated worlds.

projects.name: Bluff Wars - iOS/Android Game
projects.blurb: A hilarious social trivia game with a twist - you don't need to know the answer, just make something up to trick your friends!

projects.name: Nubuwo Summer Bundle: music inspired by videogames
projects.blurb: Fund a CD release for the Rokko Chan arrangement compilation, and discover a diverse bundle of videogame-related music.

projects.name: The Crystal Catacombs
projects.blurb: An exploration based, retro action/RPG platformer that incorporates a variety of roguelike mechanics.

projects.name: Quest For Infamy - An Adventure Game By Infamous Quests
projects.blurb: A classic retro-styled point and click adventure/role-playing game.  Take a walk on the dark side and see how you fare.

projects.name: Historables: Marie Ant-toinette  -- App for iPad & Android
projects.blurb: Historables Apps -- feature adorable, historical characters to delight children 3 to 6 with story, music, humor and  creativity.
